Articles.Content:
This may not seem like an acheivement, but today I finally escaped Kerbin gravity!

The good news

Orbit around Kerbol

Good job on getting a spaceship into kerbol orbit. You should make a rescue ship to get the kerbals out of there or just leave it there and use it as a sun station. I made a spaceship and sent it into kerbol orbit for my new project called project kerbol it has done really well. but still good job on getting to space
Congratulation! I remember my first rocket to escape the influence of Kerbin. It released the Helios mk3 probe.
